name: Space Shooter (itch) (KWE Game Design)
description:
Title: Space Shooter

Platform: PC Browser

Genre: Shooter

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

A space shooter game where players shoot enemy space ships to get the highest score

Instructions:

Control ship movement with arrow keys or W, A, S, D. Spacebar shoots the laser gun.

Game Design Team: 

Kameron Eaton - Game Designer
